events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin the review shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter from the engineering team has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully and you demonstrated a solid understanding of software development principles.
We have scheduled your technical interview for Tuesday next week to further evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
You completed the technical interview with great results, impressing the panel with both your coding proficiency and system design knowledge.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for Wednesday afternoon to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
You finished the HR interview showing great enthusiasm and alignment with our company values and workplace environment.
We have sent you an offer proposal for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
You provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed excitement about joining our engineering team.
You officially accepted our job offer, confirming your commitment to start the new role with us.
Your onboarding process has officially started, and we look forward to welcoming you to the engineering team.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are officially onboarded as a Software Engineer with our company.
